answers.text:
Hi Shannon, 
Here is a previously asked question with many answers on alcoholic beverage policy for city park facilities. In the answers you may be able to find a template for guidelines and protocols that you can apply to your municipal golf course.http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/20527
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Shannon Delaney
text: What guidelines/ protocols have other municipal golf courses used for the sale of beer?
title: Guidelines/ protocols for municipal golf courses selling beer
